attributes.action: Dress up as Father Christmas to show he is not against Christmas.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to recent news of the Government's favorite think tank being about dumbing down Christmas which is a insult to the country i believe he should for one day wear a Father Christmas outfit to prove to the country that he is not completly against Christmas.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
